frames.caption: A breathtaking view of a sunset above the clouds, with a starry sky overhead. The horizon glows with warm hues of orange and pink, contrasting with the deep blues and purples of the night sky.
frames.description: The scene captures a serene and majestic sunset above a thick layer of clouds, transitioning into a star-filled night sky. The vibrant colors of the sunset blend seamlessly with the darker tones of the evening, creating a peaceful and awe-inspiring atmosphere.

frames.caption: A dramatic scene captures a powerful lightning bolt illuminating the night sky. Thick, dark clouds dominate the foreground, creating a sense of depth and intensity.
frames.description: The scene depicts a nighttime sky during a thunderstorm, with a striking lightning bolt cutting through the clouds. The atmosphere is tense and dynamic, highlighting the raw power of nature.

frames.caption: A dramatic scene unfolds in the sky as lightning bolts pierce through thick, dark clouds. The intense light from the lightning creates a stark contrast against the ominous backdrop, highlighting the turbulent atmosphere.
frames.description: The image captures a powerful thunderstorm with bright lightning illuminating dark storm clouds. The setting is likely high in the sky, emphasizing the raw energy and unpredictability of nature.

summary: Nature: clouds, lightning, sunset, stars, night sky. Scenes: sky, thunderstorm, sunset, nighttime. Concepts: tranquility, beauty, transition, power of nature, weather phenomenon. Emotions: intensity, drama, serenity, awe. Objects: clouds. Actions: lightning strike
